Title: Beach House
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Lakshmi Sundaram, David Phillips, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (story editor), Matt O'Brien (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: The precinct's annual getaway to Boyle's beach house is ruined when Holt guilts Peralta into inviting him along for the festivities.
